title: AmLactin 12 % Moisturizing Lotion - 567 g / 20 oz
description: The active ingredient is 12% lactic acid neutralized with ammonium hydroxide. This natural AHA is equivalent to other prescription lactic acid moisturizing agents. Great for seriously dry skin conditions like eczema, icthyoses, psoriasis and keratosis pilaris. In a lighter base for those with oilier skin types, or those who live in humid climates. Supplied In Pump Action Bottle.

title: MIU COLOR® Facial Cleaning Exfoliate Brush, Facial Skin Care Tool, Pore Cleaner Brush with High Grade Pine Brush Holder and Soft Bristle
description: MIU COLOR®is based on the theme of " slow life ", simple, environmentally friendly, comfortable daily necessities for consumers everywhere, focusing on the development and extension of the day-to-day supplies, products ranging from home, office, travel, to clothing.MIU COLOR®stores cover all over the world, and provide a relaxing and harmonious, natural enjoyment for the fans of" slow life "to enjoy the sun, air, water, exercise and the source of life and health.Highlights- Brush cleansing will revive your tired skin to glow, removing dirt, make-up, and even dead skin cells- 400,000 soft bristles are densely aligned on the brush head for stable pressure for minimal irritation- Brush cleansing will remove all dirt and dead skin cells and boost your circulation to increase blood flow to the cells to restore skin's vitalityHow to use1. Wet the brush under running water2. Apply small amount of facial cleanser to the brush3. Gently apply the brush to your face moving in a circular motion. Note, do not press hard as it will be counterproductive4. Because of the soft bristles, you may use this brush several times a day without irritation(however, depending upon facial cleanser used irritation may occur so we recommend natural chemical free cleansers)5. After use, hang brush to dry. Because of patented antimicrobial design of the bristles, bacteria do not form
